title: Cooki3Monst3r1337
author: Cooki3Monst3r1337
content: What is Browser Automation Studio?The BAS Framework is developed by Bablosoft, a firm offering various automation and utility tools.The BAS is a Windows-only automation environment that allows users to create applications with a browser, HTTP client, email client and other libraries.What can be done with it?Custom Brute Force Tasks & JobsCookie Checkers / ValidatorsAuto Registers, Commenters, Posters, ViewersIncrease traffic or Generate ClicksScrape Websites / DataFile Management / SortersEmail Validators / Checkers / Crawlers / ParsersMobile EmulationsOTP / Email Verification CapturesGrab any account or log information you may wantWant to talk more about a custom project? or even see some that I have personally available or want to learn more about it or even design scripts your self?Feel free to contact me directly - https://t.me/Cooki3Monst3r1337orvisit my homepage @ https://UniversalCookieChecker.com
